content:
elliottt commented on issue #4988:

Looks good, thanks!

The ability to say that two fallible extractors are disjoint sure would be nice in a lot of these cases, it seems. For now this is fine but something to consider IMHO!

Yeah, I agree. I had been thinking that we could make extractors for a type that we could use to merge a bunch of common tests together, but perhaps that would end up being too big a refactoring.
